description: Wrought Iron is a easily workable material used in higher-level metal products.
You may also make some other iron products more efficently using Wrought Iron.
Molten Pig Iron comes from /6/melting iron ore or Limonite/6/ in the /b/Melter/b/. The pig iron needs to be /6/mixed/6/ to seperate it into /b/Wrought Iron/b/ and /b/Slag/b/.
Pouring either /b/Molten Pig Iron or Wrought Iron/b/ onto an /b/Ingot Mold/b/ then /6/Pressing/6/ to pop out the mold yeilds your ingots.

Wrought iron can be worked into tools with /b/diamond-level mining/b/ capabilities. Do note that wrought iron is fairly brittle, and doesn't do so well as a tool head. It will have to do for now. It is currently your only option for diamond-level tools.
